attributes.action: Secure 600+ London Council-Flats For Use As MP Accomodation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Vacant council-flats are ideally-suited for use as MP second-homes; directly addressing IR35 & ongoing expenses-fiasco.

Refurbishment-costs easily-covered when monies 'unreasonably' claimed are returned to the Treasury.

MPs to pay rent on second-home, not-unlike the general-public paying hotels, travel... out of taxed-income.

rejection.details: Your petition has some overlap with this existing petition: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/PoliticalDorms/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
